config.description: Status message seen after clicking the config button.

configSaved.description: Status message seen briefly after clicking the save config button.

connected.description: Status message seen after a succesful connection.

connecting.description: Status message that can be seen if a connection is taking a long time to connect.

connectionError.description: Status message seen after a failed connection attempt.

connectionHelp.message: Make sure a Feri extension server is running on {server} port {port}.
connectionHelp.description: Help text displayed when a connection can not be made. The strings {server} and {port} will be replaced by appropriate values when displayed.

connectionHelpContinued.message: The extension server, extension client, web browser, and any networking involved may need to be modified.
connectionHelpContinued.description: Additional help text displayed when a connection an not be made.

disconnected.description: Status message seen by default, after saving options, and after disconnecting.

error.description: Badge text seen when there has been a connection error.

extensionDescription.message: Connect to Feri and reload a web page when files change.
extensionDescription.description: Summary of what this extension does.

lost.description: Badge text seen when an active connection has been lost.

lostConnection.description: Status message seen after losing a connection.

notAssociated.message: Feri is not associated with this browser tab.
notAssociated.description: Message shown if the extension is connected and the user is activating the extension in a tab that is not set to reload when notified by the extension server.

notAssociatedLinkOne.description: The first of two links shown if the extension is connected and the user is activating the extension in a tab that is not set to reload when notified by the extension server.

notAssociatedLinkTwo.description: The second of two links shown if the extension is connected and the user is activating the extension in a tab that is not set to reload when notified by the extension server.

notAssociatedOr.description: The word 'or' in the sentence, 'Associate with this tab or return to the associated tab.'

on.description: Badge text seen when there is an active connection.
